sentences.sContent: After more than a decade at the helm of Colorado State University, Albert C Yates today announced his retirement.
sentences.sCn: 在掌管科罗拉多州立大学10多年后，阿尔伯特·叶慈于今天宣布退休。

synos.tran: 舵；舵柄；领导地位；驾驶盘

trans.tranCn: 舵；舵柄；领导地位；驾驶盘
trans.tranOther: the wheel or control which guides a ship or boat
